Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: The XSD choice element extends the XML Schema definition. It provides a single or multiple choices of content elements in an arbitrary order. We describes how to use the choice element within XSDs and how to access the values in a JSP with EL.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: The XSD choice element extends the XML Schema definition. It provides a single or multiple choices of content elements in an arbitrary order. We describes how to use the choice element within XSDs and how to access the values in a JSP with EL.

Link.LinkText: Infos on a contents structure in general
